about_the_game:
The story of this game takes place in a magical alternate world, and the protagonist is a young teenager who needs to embark on a difficult journey to save the world. In the process, he got acquainted with a girl magician partner, she and the protagonist have different goals, but the adventure journey of the two together is bound to be full of thrills and excitement.

In the game, every choice of the player may affect the subsequent development of the plot, so extra caution is required. In particular, if the player chooses to be the partner of the patron saint of the cat family, he needs to make the right decision, otherwise he may become the partner of the devil, and eventually become the player's enemy and BOSS.

In addition, there is a hidden task for players to solve, which is to recruit "Son of the Red Dragon". This task is quite challenging and requires players to enter a mysterious different space with specific items and solve all the puzzles. However, if you choose to use this item, you will never be able to complete this quest.

In the end, the BOSS that the player will face is actually the king himself. His purpose is to summon the BOSS of the next DLC. The game story also leaves suspense at this critical moment, reserving a mysterious and mysterious place for the next version of the game. Fascinating direction to go.

===========================================

no internet connection required
fits any model
Both PC and mobile phone can play
